data.text: @InStyle It's not the fans or haters business what Kim or any other celeb do with their kids hair.  Y'all not paying these folks bills !
@InStyle One of my girls has very curly hair. She’s straightened it just for the change.

@InStyle She should tell them to kick rocks. People gave me HELL fir straightening my daughters hair. But her hair is to her waist, it’s a lot of hair&a lot of work to comb straightening it made life easier for both of us. I don’t know why she did it, but it’s her daughter leave her alone https://t.co/iSZa4ZlRa2
